post.body: Test post - please ignore. Also, fuck the Chinese government.
Does anyone know how to create a new channel on ZeroVoat? Can anyone make a channel or is it just for admins?

comment.body: @Sksn: Wow, I'm surprised at how active ZeroNet is. I didn't expect to get a reply before I had even left the page. Neat. Do you know if there are any reddit-style forums that actually have "subreddits"? The inability to sort content on the few ZeroSites I've been on is annoying.
